content: Tim lays there, feeling the gentle rocking of Samantha's body as she dreams. He notices the way her hips press against his boxers, the softness of her skin as she continues to innocently suck on his lip. He can feel the warmth of her breath on his face and the gentle pressure of her body against his. He looks down, taking in the sight of her lower pelvic area rubbing against his boxers. The way the light from the moon shines on her skin and highlights the curves of her body. He reflects on how innocent and pure this moment is, and how comfortable and relaxed Samantha seems. Overall, he is reflecting on the sensual and emotional feelings that arise from the moment, that everything is happening in a pure and innocent way.
